coded_answer.p: Thanks for your letter. I have readingread the letter and I was very surprised that I have won the first prize.

About the time when I likewant to travel is onlyit can only be in July, because in the summer is itit is very busy at work. People wherewhom I workingwork with they are going on holiday in JuniJune and August. So heythey need me at work in thatthose months.

FurtherAlso, the accomodationaccommodation I would prefer at Camp California is the log cabin. Because, because, at firstfirst when I was a little child we were stayingstayed every holiday in a small housein a small house every holiday and I like that. At secondSecond, I don't like tents and I don'tcan't get used to itthem, so I prefer log cabins.

About the different activities, we like them all, but If I choosehave to choose two I takeopt for sailing and tennis. In the summer I'm sailing in races almost every weekend and I have my own sailing clothes. I'm not very good inat Tennistennis but I can practise on my traveltrip.
Finally, I have one question about the money. WhichWhat things I mustmust I paidpay for on my traveltrip?
Thanks for your letter. How are you? With me is everything fineEverything is fine with me and the pop concert was great.

I enjoyed helping at the popconcertpop concert, but it's very stressful work. You always walk from side to side to movemoving things and there's no break. Some other work whatthat I have donedid was to lead the people to theretheir places. We have workedworked the whole day and luckily at least we had some food.

The most beautifulbest things were that we saw famous singers and I spoke with Robbie Williams. He's friendly and very handsome offof course. If you see the famous singers in realityin the flesh they are different and the most singers they haven't time for youhaven't any time for you.

Another thing I have donedid was the make upmake-up but only for about fifteen minutes. That was very nice, because I didn't expectedexpect that. There were some people theywho gave me some adviseadvice about to cleancleaning the face and etc.
Finally, it was a very nice day withand a great experience.
